sys_ux_client_script.name: fetch related catalog items info

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_649513e493607110fa9688c68f57b20b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="">f09513e405607110b21d17f19e44421f</macroponent><name>fetch related catalog items info</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var input = api.data.evam_data_resource_1.compositeDataViews;
    var result = [];
    var filterOutRecords = api.data.look_up_records_1.results.map((element) => {
        return element.sys_id.value;
    });
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        if (filterOutRecords.indexOf(model.model.sys_id) != -1) {
            if (model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"] != null)
                model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " with " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_price"] + " " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"];
            result.push(input.items[i]);
        }
    }
    input.items = result;
    api.setState('relatedCatalogItems', input);
    if (input.items.length > 0) {
        api.setState('rowVisibility', false);
    } else {
        api.setState('rowVisibility', true);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-06 09:38:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>649513e493607110fa9688c68f57b20b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetch related catalog items info</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KS Investment Requests" source="x_557984_ks_inve_0">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="KS Investment Requests">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_649513e493607110fa9688c68f57b20b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-06 09:38:03</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
